articles.description: Which players stood out in the Texas Bowl?
articles.content: The LSU Tigers football team never had a chance; Kansas State beat them 42-20 in the Texas bowl. LSU was missing a lot of players due to many reasons and could not overcome it. Now the Brian Kelly Er… [+1541 chars]
